movies.title: The Call of Cthulhu
movies.plot: A faithful rendition of H.P. Lovecraft's short story, presented in the style of a silent film from the 1920s. While organizing the affairs of his late Uncle, a man accidentally stumbles across a series of clues toward an ancient horror lurking beneath the sea, waiting for the time when the "Stars are Right" and it shall be free to wreck havoc upon mankind. In his investigation he learns of an artist influenced by strange dreams, a police officer discovering an ancient cult worshiping "Great Cthulhu" and ultimately a tale of sailors encountering sanity-shattering horror as they discover Cthulhu himself.
movies.simplePlot: While sorting the affairs of his late Uncle, a man accidentally stumbles across a series of dark secrets connected to an ancient horror waiting to be freed.

biography.bio: Matt Foyer is an actor, known for The Call of Cthulhu (2005), The Whisperer in Darkness (2011) and Follow the Bitch (1996).
biography.name: Matt Foyer

biography.bio: John Bolen was born on August 27, 1953 in Georgia, USA. He is an actor, known for The Call of Cthulhu (2005), Mega Shark vs. Giant Octopus (2009) and Lily (2009).
biography.name: John Bolen

biography.bio: Ralph Lucas is an actor and writer, known for The Call of Cthulhu (2005), The Child (1977) and Ghost Stories: Graveyard Thriller (1986).
biography.name: Ralph Lucas

biography.bio: Chad Fifer is an actor and composer, known for The Call of Cthulhu (2005), The Chosen One (2007) and The Ward (2009). He has been married to Heather Klinke since May 12, 2007.
biography.name: Chad Fifer

biography.bio: Susan Zucker is an actress, known for The Call of Cthulhu (2005).
biography.name: Susan Zucker

biography.bio: Kalafatic Poole was born on June 14, 1977 in Helena, Montana, USA. He is an actor, known for The Call of Cthulhu (2005), Everything That Rises (1998) and Sleepless Night in the Middle of Nowhere (2010).
biography.name: Kalafatic Poole

biography.bio: John Klemantaski was born on May 5, 1951 in London, England. He is an actor and writer, known for The Call of Cthulhu (2005), Chrysalis (2008) and Most High (2004).
biography.name: John Klemantaski

biography.bio: Jason Owens is known for his work on The Call of Cthulhu (2005), The Sex Doll She-Bitch (2009) and The Stalker (2011).
biography.name: Jason Owens

biography.bio: D. Grigsby Poland is an actor, known for A Perfect Getaway (2009), The Call of Cthulhu (2005) and Enigma (2009).
biography.name: D. Grigsby Poland

biography.bio: North Dakota native, former boxer, political candidate, Congressional Aide, Elementary school teacher. Chicago Golden Gloves Boxing Champion. Spent several years in the vibrant Chicago theatre scene. Favorite roles include: Bent (Max), Terra Nova (Scott), Julius Caesar (Cassius), Reservoir Dogs (Mr. White), Red Dragon (Jack Crawford), The Crucible (John Proctor). Appeared in "Edward II" with Ammar Daraiseh, "Just Say No" with Greg Lougainis. Recurring role on CBS's "The Guardian" as Gene Everton, City Attorney.
biography.name: David Mersault

biography.bio: Barry Lynch was born in Brooklyn, New York, USA. He is an actor, known for The Whisperer in Darkness (2011), Red Dead Redemption (2010) and The Call of Cthulhu (2005).
biography.name: Barry Lynch

biography.bio: Dan Novy is known for his work on 24 (2001), Blood Diamond (2006) and The Last Samurai (2003).
biography.name: Dan Novy

biography.bio: Daryl Ball is an actor, known for The Call of Cthulhu (2005), Go for Broke 2 (2005) and The Life and the Passion of Christ (2005).
biography.name: Daryl Ball

biography.bio: A New Orleans native, John started acting in High School. A Viet Nam veteran of the U.S. Navy, he returned to Louisiana and went to work diving in the Oilfields of the world. After years abroad John returned to the stage, film,television and voiceover in Louisiana and Los Angeles. John resides in Baton Rouge,Louisiana.
biography.name: John Joly

biography.bio: Jason Peterson is an actor and producer, known for Vertical Limit (2000), King Rising - Au nom du Roi (2007) and The Call of Cthulhu (2005).
biography.name: Jason Peterson
